    • createMonthTypeReport

      private static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> createMonthTypeReport(Map<String,Long> groupedByMonthAndType)
      Creates a report based on the provided map grouping appointments by month and type. The report is sorted by keys (month and type) in ascending order.
      Parameters:
      groupedByMonthAndType - Map grouping appointments by month and type.
      Returns:
      ObservableList containing the formatted report.

    • sortAppointmentByMonthType

      private static Map<String,Long> sortAppointmentByMonthType(List<Appointment> appointmentList)
      Groups appointments by month and type, then counts them.
      Parameters:
      appointmentList - List of appointments to be grouped.
      Returns:
      Map containing appointments grouped by month and type, along with their counts.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      ObservableList containing the formatted report.

    • sortContactsById

      private static Map<Integer,Map<String,List<Appointment>>> sortContactsById(List<Appointment> appointmentList)
      Groups appointments by contact ID and contact name using Java streams.
      Parameters:
      appointmentList - List of appointments to be grouped.
      Returns:
      Map containing appointments grouped by contact ID and further grouped by contact full name.

      Returns:
